glob-watcher

Information

<table> <tr> <td>Package</td><td>glob-watcher</td> </tr> <tr> <td>Description</td> <td>Watch globs</td> </tr> <tr> <td>Node Version</td> <td>>= 0.9</td> </tr> </table>

Usage

var watch = require('glob-watcher');

// callback interface
watch(["./*.js", "!./something.js"], function(evt){
  // evt has what file changed and all that jazz
});

// EE interface
var watcher = watch(["./*.js", "!./something.js"]);
watcher.on('change', function(evt) {
  // evt has what file changed and all that jazz
});

// add files after it has been created
watcher.add("./somefolder/somefile.js");
